name: Thunder-NRG #1 : Possessed by an "XTZ Spirit"
description:
THUNDER-NRG (雷-nrg) is the protagonist of the series premiere, he's a solo singer who wants to, he is just a casual worker in a company not good enough while progressing in this mortal life, at his age
who had just turned 20, THUNDER-NRG's parents died of
snares of a cruel economic system. The situation of THUNDER-NRG is getting worse in the weeks after the parents died
THUNDER-NRG was fired because his office friend wanted to drop his life, then he was depressed because of his economic situation
did not get better, until finally, he became seriously depressed until he wanted to end his life by injecting himself
with the MOUTH-TURAH virus, but the action was stopped because the blue light only read XTZ, then he was given
a verse and a book to study, the light only says that he will gain strength so that he can help
people around.

Ability :
Lightning & Time Manipulation
